about_the_game:
Renown takes the most enjoyable and popular aspects from contemporary open-world survival games which include Building, Progression and Social Politics. These are then combined with close quarters, skill-based combat to create an immersive and engaging multiplayer experience.

Combat

Skill based melee combat, easy to learn, hard to master.


Building

From a small shack to entire fortresses, creating structures truly unique to the person's ability and experience.


Raiding

What’s the point in building a great castle if you can’t level someone else's to the ground.


Gathering

You'll need to get those hatchets and pickaxes to work if you want to keep yourself alive.


Crafting

To compete in the arms race you'll need to craft, from wooden clubs to an entire trebuchet, all are made at your workbenches.


Customization

Don't get mistaken as another, wear your colors and emblems with pride.


Hunting

They are all the same to you, you just need their resources.


Safezone & Vendors

Create enemies, build alliances, have a friendly duel and trade items, all from the safety of the safe zone.


Environment

Explore the lands, build your kingdom and dominate!



Key Features:



  • Fast-paced PvP medieval survival with a strong emphasis on melee combat.
  • From building humble farms to huge fortresses, the choice is with the player.
  • Destroy all your neighbors with awe inspiring siege engines
  • Group systems for making Claims, taking titles, giving ranks and more.
  • Customize everything from the helmet on your head to the banners on your base
  • Server Progression and Wipe systems, for an engaging and vastly replayable experience.
  • Tools for Community Hosts to help tailor their servers. Future plans for extensive moddability.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features medieval combat which ticks the violence box in many ways. It comes with a gore feature for dismemberment and related effects. We'll be including options to disable gore/dismemberment.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel (R) Core (TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 or AMD equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-2600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3070 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

name: Renown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel (R) Core (TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-2600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3070 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Renown is a fast paced multiplayer survival experience set in a vast and ever changing medieval world. Players begin with nothing, gather resources, build a kingdom and fight to survive in the hopes of becoming renowned across the land.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
